评论概述: Perfect for the ghosts during a high school musical

My daughter loves this! She wore it to school on Halloween and it was able to handle the weight of her backpack without snagging.  We live in a hot, humid climate so it was perfect for her.

I got this for a costume and let me just say it’s AMAZING. It’s gorgeous and really a nice addition to my wardrobe.
